description: Try our easy to follow Piri Piri Prawn Cutlets recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: BBQ prawn,Pescatarian,Prawn,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,High protein,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Piri Piri Prawn Cutlets Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 lemon, juiced and rind finely grated

recipeInstructions.text: Using a small sharp knife, cut along the underside of green prawn cutlets and open out flat. Place into a shallow ceramic dish.

Deseed 1 long red chilli and 1 small red chilli and finely chop. Put into a bowl. Add olive oil, garlic cloves, finely grated rind of lemon, lemon juice, finely chopped oregano leaves, salt and pepper.
Pour over prawns and turn to coat. Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Preheat a barbecue hot plate over a high heat. Grease with 1 tbs olive oil. Add prawns and cook for 1-2 minutes each side or until cooked through.
